definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">entity_pre_hurt</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_nbt_logic_get"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">duelist_affix</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_negate"><value name="BOOL"><block type="compare_entities"><value name="a"><block type="entity_gettargetentity"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="b"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="set_damage"><value name="dmg"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MULTIPLY</field><value name="A"><block type="custom_dependency_number"><field name="NAME">amount</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.5</field></block></value></block></value></block></statement></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
